headline: Prudential Japan CEO Exit Tests Governance And Investor Confidence
summary: Prudential Financial’s Japan life insurance unit is undergoing a leadership change after its CEO resigned following an employee misconduct scandal. The incident involves misconduct by hundreds of employees and affected customers, triggering governance and oversight reviews at the Japan business. Investors are watching how Prudential Financial, NYSE:PRU, responds to the issue within its international operations framework. For investors looking at Prudential Financial, NYSE:PRU, the...
